name: Skyboy Minis: It's Raining Bombs!
description:
It's Raining Bombs is a multiplayer game where 3 players try to avoid being blown up by the bombs that keep raining down from above. Players increase their chances for survival by picking up bombs before they explode and throwing them away, often at other players. The winner is the player who gets blown up least.

Created for #1GAM (OneGameAMonth) and inspired by the August keyword: "Splash" (as in "Splash-damage".)

"It's Raining Bombs" featured at 5:30 in the video.

"I lost, but I had fun losing. Next!"

- Jupi, "Jupi Plays Indie Games: ALL THE INDIE GAMES"
